CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Good miscibility could be observed in all of the PffBB-n:PC71BM blended thin films , which gives rise to desirable phase separation.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |

The two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "PffBB-n" and "PC71BM". These are the materials that are being blended together in the thin films.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |

The two entities in the paragraph are "PffBB-n" and "PC71BM". After reviewing the paragraph again, I still believe that these are the only two entities that clearly refer to material names. The term "blended thin films" refers to a property or characteristic of the materials, rather than being a material itself.
